name: What is Advent of Code?
value:
Advent of Code (AoC) is a series of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill levels, run every year during the month of December.

They are self-contained and are just as appropriate for an expert who wants to stay sharp as they are for a beginner who is just learning to code. Each puzzle calls upon different skills and has two parts that build on a theme.

name: How do I sign up?
value: Sign up with one of these services:

name: How does scoring work?
value:
For the [global leaderboard](https://adventofcode.com/leaderboard), the first person to get a star first gets 100 points, the second person gets 99 points, and so on down to 1 point at 100th place.

For private leaderboards, the first person to get a star gets N points, where N is the number of people on the leaderboard. The second person to get the star gets N-1 points and so on and so forth.

name: Join our private leaderboard!
value: Come join the Python Discord private leaderboard and compete against other people in the community! Get the join code using `.aoc join` and visit the [private leaderboard page](https://adventofcode.com/leaderboard/private) to join our leaderboard.
